CustomField.formula: Account.Primary_Contact__r.Email + ' & ' + Account.Name + ' & ' + Account.BillingPostalCode + ' & ' + Account.Primary_Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + Account.Primary_Contact__r.LastName + ' & ' + Account.Privacy_Contact__r.Phone + ' & ' + Account.Primary_Contact__r.MobilePhone
CustomField.label: Contact Information
